data.message: I would like to ask how come facebook, is blocking me for 30 days just because I tried to invite people and friends who I know the longest time. This is not fair. I also like to express my disappointment because I was blocked already for 14 days, because I had pending friends, that did not reply. To be honest with Facebook, I do not invite people I do not know. I really hope the facebook management should be fair and the IT team.
